issue.title: Some Google's domains used for ads/tracking to be blocked (Missed ads/tracking)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Public Plain DNS (Default servers)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, other (specify in comment below), the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites and apps

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Here are some Google's domains used for serving ads or for tracking that aren't currently blocked by AdGuard Public DNS: Some of them seem to only be contacted by mobile apps.

```
analytics-api-samples.googlecode.com
video-stats.video.google.com
www.googleadservices.com
domains.googlesyndication.com
www.googletagservices.com
ads.google.com
afs.googlesyndication.com
mobileads.google.com
video-ad-stats.googlesyndication.com
adservice.google.com
googletagmanager.com
www.googletagmanager.com
mobileads.google.com
mail-ads.google.com
pagead.l.doubleclick.net
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Em1F_xNLr_0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DEm1F_xNLr_0) ### Comment > I think it was because I activate stealth mode. my firefox setting is 'open previous windows and tabs' checked marked. so i need to clear all history everytime I start firefox, for the adguard to work. and i don't want that, because I have to login on all sites all over, everyday if I clear the history everytime I use firefox. > if I toggle on the adguard, youtube is instantly refreshing and blocking the videos > Please fix ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pit932cot40k4g00go484gk4k4wg0cwmrji0tlpdjk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/255xpvni6kros0cw0c0cs404cs8sscs3bhhqdnzese.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Russian,

issue.title: www.iqiyi.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.iqiyi.com/v_2gddx4v0on4.html?iqiyi=o&bkt=list_main%2Cgreeting_rank3_d%2Cfilter_d%2Cgreeting_rank4_e%2Ccategory_page_05%2Cgreeting_rank2_d%2Cgreeting_rank1_h%2Cmr01%2Cgreeting_recall3_i%2Cgreeting_recall2_f%2Ccontent_c%2Ccategory_lib_b_1%2Clist_online&e=a2cd98fc301a1ca7de9d6c624514b048&stype=2&vfrm=category_lib.6&vfrmblk=S%3Alib_1_video&vfrmrst=S%3Alib_1_video_float_video_area12](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2Fv_2gddx4v0on4.html%3Fiqiyi%3Do%26bkt%3Dlist_main%252Cgreeting_rank3_d%252Cfilter_d%252Cgreeting_rank4_e%252Ccategory_page_05%252Cgreeting_rank2_d%252Cgreeting_rank1_h%252Cmr01%252Cgreeting_recall3_i%252Cgreeting_recall2_f%252Ccontent_c%252Ccategory_lib_b_1%252Clist_online%26e%3Da2cd98fc301a1ca7de9d6c624514b048%26stype%3D2%26vfrm%3Dcategory_lib.6%26vfrmblk%3DS%253Alib_1_video%26vfrmrst%3DS%253Alib_1_video_float_video_area12) ### Comment > 之前开启移动广告过滤器后 可以过滤爱奇艺暂停广告 但是2023年7月22日开始失效 会间歇性出现暂停广告 解决办法是关闭edge浏览器重开后 在一定时间内可以过滤 但是超过1个小时左右就失效 查看过滤日志 发现失效后 在已修改统计下 会有很多条爱奇艺记录（正常过滤时候 已修改分类下不存在记录） ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4bjgcae14ps0s80kgsk484c8o0go0kgi8l6m9k7bvw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,

List-KR

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.iqiyi.com/v_2gddx4v0on4.html?iqiyi=o&bkt=list_main%2Cgreeting_rank3_d%2Cfilter_d%2Cgreeting_rank4_e%2Ccategory_page_05%2Cgreeting_rank2_d%2Cgreeting_rank1_h%2Cmr01%2Cgreeting_recall3_i%2Cgreeting_recall2_f%2Ccontent_c%2Ccategory_lib_b_1%2Clist_online&e=a2cd98fc301a1ca7de9d6c624514b048&stype=2&vfrm=category_lib.6&vfrmblk=S%3Alib_1_video&vfrmrst=S%3Alib_1_video_float_video_area12](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2Fv_2gddx4v0on4.html%3Fiqiyi%3Do%26bkt%3Dlist_main%252Cgreeting_rank3_d%252Cfilter_d%252Cgreeting_rank4_e%252Ccategory_page_05%252Cgreeting_rank2_d%252Cgreeting_rank1_h%252Cmr01%252Cgreeting_recall3_i%252Cgreeting_recall2_f%252Ccontent_c%252Ccategory_lib_b_1%252Clist_online%26e%3Da2cd98fc301a1ca7de9d6c624514b048%26stype%3D2%26vfrm%3Dcategory_lib.6%26vfrmblk%3DS%253Alib_1_video%26vfrmrst%3DS%253Alib_1_video_float_video_area12) ### Comment > 之前开启移动广告过滤器后 可以过滤爱奇艺暂停广告 但是2023年7月22日开始失效 会间歇性出现暂停广告 解决办法是关闭edge浏览器重开后 在一定时间内可以过滤 但是超过1个小时左右就失效 查看过滤日志 发现失效后 在已修改统计下 会有很多条爱奇艺记录（正常过滤时候 已修改分类下不存在记录） ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4bjgcae14ps0s80kgsk484c8o0go0kgi8l6m9k7bvw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce it.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/e78fd25c-f7d8-45c1-8273-8ea13c6a0b82)

issue.title: timesofindia.indiatimes.com

labels.name: A: In progress
